TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IScrollInfo

summary.span: 表示 控件内的主要可滚动区域。

span.span: Represents the main scrollable region inside a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口公开访问启用的子内容的逻辑滚动，以及计算哪些子元素可见的方法。The interface exposes access to methods that enable logical scrolling of child content as well as computing which child elements are visible. 此外，它定义用于定义可滚动区域的属性。In addition, it defines properties used to define the scrollable region. 逻辑滚动支持滚动到的逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling enables scrolling to the next element in the logical tree. 与此相反，物理滚动，按照指定方向中定义的显著提高增量滚动内容。Physical scrolling, in contrast, scrolls content by a defined measurable increment in a specified direction. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素和的值设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set the value of its property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHorizontallyScroll { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在水平轴上滚动。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.

value.span: 如果可以滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if scrolling is possible; otherwise, .
This property has no default value.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Rect MakeVisible (System.Windows.Media.Visual visual, System.Windows.Rect rectangle);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Rect MakeVisible(class System.Windows.Media.Visual visual, valuetype System.Windows.Rect rectangle) cil managed
abstract member MakeVisible : System.Windows.Media.Visual * System.Windows.Rect -> System.Windows.Rect

span.span: A that becomes visible.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 标识要使其可见的坐标空间的边界矩形。

span.span: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.

summary.span: 强制内容滚动，直至 对象的坐标空间可见。

span.span: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a object is visible.
A that is visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，返回的矩形是矩形的输入的转换后的版本。In most cases, the returned rectangle is a transformed version of the input rectangle. 在某些情况下，例如当输入的矩形不能完全适合视区内，返回的值可能较小。In some cases, such as when the input rectangle cannot fit entirely within the viewport, the return value may be smaller.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个控制滚动行为的 元素。

span.span: Gets or sets a element that controls scrolling behavior.

value.span: 控制滚动行为的 元素。

span.span: A element that controls scrolling behavior.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现必须调用属性更改时此对象上。Classes that implement must call on this object when properties change. 逻辑滚动支持滚动到的逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling enables scrolling to the next element in the logical tree. 与此相反，物理滚动，按照指定方向中定义的显著提高增量滚动内容。Physical scrolling, in contrast, scrolls content by a defined measurable increment in a specified direction. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机中的元素和的值设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set the value of its property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置通过过程代码的属性。The following example shows how to set the property by using procedural code. [!code-csharp[IScrollInfoMethods#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/IScrollInfoMethods/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IScrollInfoMethods#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/IScrollInfoMethods/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]
